content: PM 2-PE Point laser High-precision plumb laser with 2 points and red beam ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Laser layout tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Plumb bob laser – self-leveling, 2-point laser with red beam Longer-range precision – laser dot size optimized for alignment up to 30 m Longer-range precision – laser dot size optimized for alignment up to 100 ft Out-of-level and low-battery alerts – help prevent plumbing mistakes and unexpected downtime Robust build – rubber-coated housing and pendulum lock help to withstand real jobsite conditions Applications Rail alignment for elevator applications Transferring points from floor to ceiling Vertical alignment of doors ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accuracy: ±0.06 in at 33 ft Max. operating distance (diameter): 98 ft (points) Maximum operating time: 50 h Technical Data | Maximum operating time | 50 h | Battery type | 4 x 1.5 V (AA) | Self leveling range at room temperature | ±4 ° | Self leveling time | 3 s | IP protection class | IP 54 (EN 60529) | Laser type | Point ### ITEMS- 2277042 - PM2-PE Point Laser - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PM 2-PE Point laser - 4x AA (2) Battery alkaline - 1x PMW 60 Soft Pouch
